trends.topic: Anthropic’s multi-session Claude SDK and the race to practical AI agents
trends.reason: Anthropic’s release of a new multi-session Claude SDK, pitched as solving the long-standing AI agent problem, marks a concrete step toward persistent, tool-using AI assistants that can handle real-world workflows—an area now seeing rapid, competitive innovation and immediate enterprise interest.
trends.search_keywords: Anthropic, Claude, AI agents, multi-session SDK, agent framework, tool use
